Name: Explicitly Add IIS WindowsAuthentication Providers
Description: Clears the WindowsAuthentication Providers, and explicitly adds the ones provided.
Author: KShanafelt

Parameters.Name: add-windows-authentication-providers.is-enabled
Parameters.Label: Add Windows Authentication Providers
Parameters.HelpText:
If enabled, This step will clear the Windows Authentication Providers, and then add the ones listed in the
    Windows Authentication Providers
field.

Parameters.Name: add-windows-authentication-providers.website-name
Parameters.Label: Web Site name
Parameters.HelpText: The display name of the IIS web site to add Windows Authentication providers to.

Parameters.Name: add-windows-authentication-providers.providers
Parameters.Label: Windows Authentication Providers
Parameters.HelpText: A comma- or newline-separated list of Windows Authentication Providers to add.
